column.name: COMMENT_REPORT
column.Comment: 評論檢舉 被檢舉:1 無:0

column.name: COM_POST_ACCESS_SETTING
column.Comment: 文章後台權限(1正常0封鎖)

column.name: COM_POST_UPLOAD_TIME
column.Comment: 社群文章附檔上傳時間

column.name: COM_REPLY_ACCESS_SETTING
column.Comment: 留言後台權限(1正常0封鎖)

column.name: COM_REPLY_EMOTION
column.Comment: 按讚社群留言(1喜歡0不喜歡)

column.name: ADD_AND_REMOVE
column.Comment: 上下架 上架:1 下架:0

column.name: COURSES_REPORT
column.Comment: 課程檢舉 被檢舉:1無:0

column.name: FAVORITE_COURSES
column.Comment: 加入喜歡:1 沒有加入:0

column.name: NOTIFICATION_STATUS
column.Comment: 查看是否(1已查看0未查看)

column.name: SHOP_PRODUCT_STATUS
column.Comment: 商品狀態(2上架1下架0被下架)

column.name: SHOP_REPORT_REASON
column.Comment: 檢舉事由(由使用者勾選)

column.name: SHOP_REPORT_RESULT
column.Comment: 檢舉結果(1檢舉成功0檢舉失敗)

column.name: COURSES_PROGRESS
column.Comment: 課程進度 已完成:1 未完成:0
